messages.message: hi team. does anyone know when InstaLLM will be available to be installed OnPrem in a customer / Prospects environment? Either for a PoV or in Production

As Anant mentioned (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C0516UPPMT3/p1701085744045959) any on-prem install *or* InstaLLM should only be considered for customers after an exception has been granted by Anant and Clemens. In general, we’re trying to move away from on-prem installations and encourage Saas.

For InstaLLM, this should be a backup option to OpenAI and then Azure. Only if these two options are not on the table, then you can ask for an exception for Anant/Clemens to use InstaLLM.

For InstaLLM + on-prem. We are actively working on supporting this configuration in Q4, but again, this is currently only approved for very specific integrations/customers.
